name: Internet Society - Bulgaria
membership: We are an official chapter of the Internet Society (based in Reston, VA, USA and Geneva, Switzerland)
goal:
Promote the open, free and bottom-up development of the internet.
Ensure that Bulgaria and other countries have Internet-friendly legislation.
interests: Communication, Education, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Copyright, internet (net neutrality, etc.), tackling fake news (our chair is a member of the HLEG on fake news and disinformation), children online protection, fighting extremism and hate language online.
